text: Augusto Caminito (1 July 1939 – 23 August 2020) was an Italian movie director, screenwriter, and producer. He was born in Naples. As a director, he was known for his works Grandi cacciatori (1988) and Vampire in Venice (1988). He produced Ne parliamo Lunedì (1990). He also wrote the screenplay for Halleluja for Django (1967). Caminito died on 23 August 2020 in Rome, aged 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie producers Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Movie people from Naples
title: Augusto Caminito
